table_description: GitHub Releases bundle project files for download by users.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the release.

columns.name: assets
columns.description: List of assets contained in the release.

columns.name: author_login
columns.description: The login name of the user that created the release.

columns.name: body
columns.description: Text describing the contents of the tag.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the release was created.

columns.name: draft
columns.description: True if this is a draft (unpublished) release.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: Node where GitHub stores this data internally.

columns.name: prerelease
columns.description: True if this is a prerelease version.

columns.name: published_at
columns.description: Time when the release was published.

columns.name: tag_name
columns.description: The name of the tag the release is associated with.

columns.name: target_commitish
columns.description: Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA.
